Description.Text: Recently opened in July 2008, NU Hotel offers a smart, clean, fresh design along with expert service. Acquaint yourself with this entirely new Brooklyn hotel, conceived to create an authentic travel experience integrated into the fabric of the local landscape.

• Brooklyn Academy of Music (1 mile) • Brooklyn Botanical Gardens (1 mile) • Brooklyn Bridge (1 mile) • Prospect Park Zoo (2 miles) • South Street Seaport (2.5 miles) • Battery Park & Statue of Liberty (3 miles) • Ellis Island (3 miles) • Penn Station/Madison Square Garden (6 miles) • Empire State Building (7 miles) • Times Square (8 miles)

Air-conditioned guestrooms at Nu hotel Brooklyn offer minibars, in-room safes (accommodate laptops), and climate control. Beds feature premium bedding. LCD televisions come with premium cable channels. Complimentary wireless Internet access is provided along with cordless phones. Bathrooms include showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Clock radios are also included. Cribs (infant beds) and roll away beds are also available. Housekeeping is provided.All guestrooms are non-smoking.

• Brownstoner's Brooklyn Flea Market (Ongoing) • 11th Annual Jazz Festival -(Ongoing annually; through April 2010) • Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Baily Circus, Coney Island, Brooklyn - June 18-September 7, 2009 • Flatbush Frolic (Annually; mid to late September) • Brooklyn Book Festival (Annually; mid September) • 34th Annual Atlantic Antic (Annually; beginning of October) • Barclays Center (Home of the Brooklyn Nets) Opening 2011

By Train: NU Hotel is located at the Corner of Smith Street and Atlantic Avenue in downtown Brooklyn, a three-minute walk from the Bergen/Smith St. Subway stop and a five-minute walk from the Hoyt-Schermerhorn Streets stop.

Bar at Nu Hotel: Full bar and signature drinks available Tuesday thru Saturday 11AM-12 midnight.
Nearby Restaurants: • The Grocery, featuring a popular tasting menu • Saul, distinguished with a Star in the Michelin Guide • Patois, featuring the Best Steak - Prix Fixe • Chestnut, offering a great brunch • Bar Tabac, ideal for kicking back and late night • Deity Bar & Lounge, Brooklyn lifestyle networking • Peter Luger Steakhouse, rated best steakhouse in New York City for 24 years in a row • River Cafe, an elegant waterfront restaurant, which has produced some of the nation's most • notable chefs
Nu Hotel Brooklyn is proud of their fantastic service and first class accommodations; offered to you at an excellent price
